en.heading: Choose a spouse for %{name}
en.info: If a cat has spouse, then they will be loyal and only have kittens with their spouses (unless affairs are toggled on). Potential spouses are listed below! The lines connecting the two cats may give a hint on their compatibility with one another, and any existing romantic feelings will be shown with small hearts.
en.no_kits_pair: m_c has no offspring with r_c.
en.no_kit_warning: This pair can't have biological kittens.
